meanings.definition: A place where clothes are washed and dried using coin-operated machines.
meanings.sent1: I need to go to the washeteria to clean my dirty clothes.
meanings.sent2: My mom took our bedsheets to the washeteria to get them washed.
meanings.sent3: The washeteria was so busy that I had to wait for a machine to become available.
meanings.sent4: The washeteria hummed with the sound of spinning washing machines.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the washeteria made it feel like daytime even at night.

meanings.definition: The act of washing clothes at a self-service laundry facility.
meanings.sent1: After work, I headed to the washeteria to do my laundry.
meanings.sent2: She prefers the washeteria because she can do her laundry quickly.
meanings.sent3: I always forget to bring enough quarters to the washeteria.
meanings.sent4: The washeteria experience is much more convenient than hand-washing clothes.
meanings.sent5: The washeteria's cleanliness and efficiency impressed me.
